name: The Quest for the Chocolate Cake!
name_original: The Quest for the Chocolate Cake!
description:
After finishing their grilled cheese, the warrior and the wizard could go for a great dessert right about now! They decide to adventure together to find a delicious chocolate cake to enjoy together! But now with many more paths to take, many more wacky stuff happens! Can the wizard and the warrior find the only way to the chocolate cake? That's for you to find out!

This is my first Visual Basic sequel from 2017!
